pages.text: It's possibly to obtain a surprising number of rare flowers, especially double-tall flowers like sunflower, peony and rose bush, from an active $(l:crafting/grove_stone)grove stone$().$(br2)The method for activating the grove stone is described in detail with the $(l:rituals/ritual_grove_supplication)Grove Supplication$() ritual, and some of the steps are also explained in the $(l:crafting/introduction#grove)introduction to crafting$().
